a place where one can rest quietly Yeonnam-dong, a quiet resting place

details.description: For those who want to travel quietly and cheaply alone, it's the perfect house. Although it's close to downtown Seoul, the accommodation is located in a quiet residential area, so you can relax quietly. It's very clean because it always cleans and manages.The spaceThe quiet house at the end of the Gyeongui Line Forest Road is the perfect house for those who want to spend the entire house alone.My house is a quiet accommodation close to Yeontral Park. You can feel the hot Yeonnam-dong with a little steps, while the accommodation is a small house where you can quietly relax after a bit of the hustle and bustle of the commercial area. There is a separate bedroom and quiet, so you can have a pleasant night's sleep.Our house is a quiet lodging house near Yeonnam-dong Park, Hongdae, Mangwon, and Han River. There are a famous restaurant and Yeontral park if you walk a little bit. But around the house is quiet.
